nodes.text: The T-0B4 Protocol Droid was a model of protocol droid used on the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. One such model was stationed on the Promenade.
The T-0B4 Protocol Droid appears on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
